title: Tertiary training in the RAAF
creator_credit: Dennis Hill Productions, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: This film depicts the training and lifestyles of the RAAF cadets. It shows the three study courses that are available to them in Australia; degrees in science, engineering and business studies. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Dennis Hill Productions, Don Murray and Film Australia
